NEW LAND RELEASE IN SEAGROVE ESTATE. CORNER BLOCK. BE QUICK!
The new Kookaburra release features absolute park views from every home,plus a brilliant location close to the main street and beach.
The Kookaburra release features underground gas (LPG), recycled water, and super fast optic
fibre connections to the National Broadband Network.
Titles are anticipated in early 2018.

Walk to the Beach
Situated on a large corner allotment, is this completely unique tri level home offering 3 large bedrooms plus a huge study or 4th bedroom, master with a full en suite facilities, open plan living with hostess kitchen and separate dining area with air conditioning. Three living areas with a downstairs games room make this a perfect holiday or permanent home.
This is a child and pet friendly property with mature trees and a landscaped gardens. All this is just 2 blocks to the beach and short stroll to Cowes central or local schools.

Description:
QUALITY HOME IN IDEAL LOCATION
This beautiful home is located in the heart of Central Cowes and is beautifully designed for the perfect holiday get away for the whole family.
This house features 3 spacious bedrooms all with large robes, the master is conveniently positioned downstairs with an ensuite and walk in robe. You will fall in love with this kitchen it’s a delight with beautiful stone bench tops and well-appointed fittings throughout. Additionally, the open plan living, kitchen and dining is north facing gaining lovely sunshine and light throughout the house, and opens out onto a great outdoor entertaining area with plenty of room for the kids and animals to run around!
Upstairs showcases two large bedrooms, one with a beautiful outdoor balcony to enjoy and newly appointed split system. The bathrooms are appointed with quality fixtures, with the upstairs bathroom boasting a beautiful big spa bath.
This home is private and tranquil being ideally set back from the Church Street in your own holiday oasis. Leave the cars at home in the double garage and stroll into the hub of Cowes where you can explore local restaurants, boutique shops, amenities and of course the beautiful Cowes foreshore beach and Jetty.
Set up to perfection and ready to holiday rent, this property would make the ideal holiday investment for you. If you’re looking for something more permanent, even better, in this location you can’t go wrong!
Book your private inspection today
Insights: 3/120 Church Street, Cowes VIC 3922 was last sold in 2017 and 63 other 3 bedroom house in Cowes have recently been sold.

Description:
What More Could You Want!
Situated on a fabulous fully fenced 654sqm approx corner allotment in a beautiful treed setting is this single level brick veneer home featuring a fantastic light filled main living area with three sets of sliding doors all leading out a gorgeous and private north facing terrace and lush yard.
Boasting three large bedrooms including built in robes, a spacious family bathroom combined laundry and a lovely open plan living, kitchen and dining area, this attractive and solid home in a wonderful location would make the ideal permanent residence or holiday retreat.
Additional features include wood fire heating, ceiling fans, dual access corner block, large rear and side yard perfect for boat or caravan storage with plenty of room for children and pets to roam, semi circular driveway.
All set on a fantastic 654sqm corner allotment in a brilliant location within walking distance to the shops, restaurants, RSL, schools, medical facilities and within close proximity to the north facing family bay beach.
Be quick this is a very sought after location.
This property for sale in Cowes, is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Description:
PRIME POSITION WITH DEVELOPMENT POTENTIAL
Very rarely do you find a home such as this one on a large allotment, (approximately 957 square metres in size) with development potential (STCA) so close to the central shopping area and beaches of Cowes. The home has been lovingly renovated and features a large NE facing deck overlooking the garden and Cowes golf course.
The home features 3 bedrooms with original timber floors, master bedroom with walk through robe and ensuite, modern kitchen with electric wall oven, cooktop and rangehood, breakfast bar, pantry cupboard and island bench. The living area features a wood combustion heater, dining area that opens onto the spacious deck, a fully renovated bathroom/ laundry and a study/ second living area with BIR’s. Other features include reverse cycle air conditioner in the living area, a 1.6kw solar power system and garden shed in the fully fenced yard. Call today to arrange an inspection.

Description:
Central Perfection.
This home is situated just 900m (approx) to the sandy shores of the north facing Cowes Beach and only 600m (approx) from the Cowes shopping strip. Standing on a 602m2 lot is this classic tri level beach house, perfectly set up for your ideal holiday home or permanent living.
3 bedrooms all with BIRs and full ensuite to the master bedroom. Dual living zones, with open plan living, kitchen and meals area which leads to the outside entertaining deck with views across the bay to the Mornington Peninsula. Downstairs offers a large second living/rumpus area with room for many options such as adding an extra bedroom or turning into a self contained unit.
This well located property is one that is a must for your further investigation.

Description:
Occupying a delightful position!
Set amongst lovely treed surrounds in the exclusive Red Rocks area is this single level brick veneer and weatherboard home.
Comprising north facing open plan living, kitchen and dining, three robed bedrooms and one bathroom. The master is complete with an additional shower and vanity.
Other great features include polished timber floors, cathedral ceilings with exposed beams throughout, split system heating and cooling, combustion heater, single garage with lights and power.
There is also two entertainment decks one at the rear of the home that overlooks the leafy rear yard, and the other that flows off the dining area.
At the rear of the property is a gate to the adjoining reserve that leads you to Red Rocks Beach
Situated on a 830 sqm approx allotment the residence is in need of some TLC and would be the perfect holiday or permanent home.
This property for sale in Cowes, is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island

Description:
Looking for a perfect investment opportunity in Cowes?
If you have been searching for an investment property, in a great central location in Cowes - then look no further!
With an excellent current long term tenant in place, this is the ideal property to begin or expand your current investment portfolio!
Situated on a fully fenced 455sqm allotment, close to all that Cowes has to offer including school, doctors, RSL, cafe's and local shopping precinct - is this immaculate 3 bedroom brick home.
With open plan living, spacious hostess kitchen with modern appliances and 3 double bedrooms all with built in robes. Outside, there is a good sized double garage with rear access, a large undercover entertaining area, and private/secure low maintenance surrounds.
Other features include:- Split system heating/cooling, external roller shutters, and water tank.
This property for sale in Cowes is proudly presented by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Description:
THE SEARCH STOPS HERE
'Vashon' is a stunning new foreshore home overlooking the beautiful Red Rocks Beach, Cowes. Vashon was aptly named after an Island off Seattle and has taken inspiration from American coastal architecture. Its polished timber floors, wainscoted walls and detailed ceilings create a sense of relaxed warmth and comfort. This home boasts panoramic views from nearly all of its rooms and two balconies plus a unique roof top deck.
Vashon allows flexibility with its dual living zones and additional downstairs kitchenette.
Features include:
Ground Floor
Bedroom 1 – Large double room with BIR's
Bedroom 2 – Large enough for a Double bunk with single over and additional trundle
Kitchenette – Fully equipped with window access to outdoor entertaining area.
Spacious living area with under stairs cubby – any child will fall in love with this!
Laundry and separate Powder room
Main Bathroom has a Double shower and separate bath
Outdoor undercover entertaining and BBQ area with outdoor shower.
Double Garage.
Upstairs:
Master Bedroom is large enough for a King Bed, private balcony, WIR and double shower ensuite,
Bedroom 4 – Double bunk with single over
Open plan Kitchen with stainless appliance and dining area
The Living Zone – has gorgeous views, a slow combustion wood heater plus split system air conditioning/heating
Balcony – Large enough for outdoor dining with a spiral staircase leading to roof top deck, ideal for a G&T to watch the sunset.
Inspection strictly by appointment. You will fall in love with this home.
Insights: 2A PENGUIN AVENUE, Cowes VIC 3922 was last sold in 2017 and 56 other 4 bedroom house in Cowes have recently been sold.

Description:
SOUGHT AFTER COWES EAST . Huge block 1150 m2 (approx)
The most perfect position in beautiful Cowes East situated on a huge allotment of 1150 m2 (approx). This is only the second time this property has been offered for sale since it was built in the 1980's. Wander down the private drive to a beautiful three bedroom home offering privacy and garden vistas from all rooms. Picture windows and high ceilings feature throughout the home. A formal entry welcomes you and to the left a lovely lounge room has an open fireplace as its focal point and a dining nook or study. The family room adjoins the large kitchen and meals area - giving this room a country ambiance with windows to the landscaped back garden and doors to the paved entertaining area. The entertaining area features a covered pergola and chicory style outdoor kitchen area with roller door.
The master bedroom features an en-suite with a huge spa and a walk in robe. Two bedrooms with built in robes share the second bathroom.
The property is complemented with a low maintenance fully landscaped garden.
A double garage could easily convert to a games room as it has large windows facing north.
Within the golden triangle of Cowes, where you can park the car and walk everywhere - to the Lovers Walk beach, the cafe and shopping precinct or get physical at the YMCA and football oval. Within minutes of Cowes Primary School and the Phillip Island Bowling Club and Phillip Island Golf Course.
Insights: 1 Gordon Street, Cowes VIC 3922 was last sold in 2017 and 63 other 3 bedroom house in Cowes have recently been sold.

Description:
LOCATION, LOCATION, LOCATION
Just released to the market is No. 2 and No. 4 Robert Drive. These three bedroom homes are in one of the best locations in Cowes, a short stroll to the stunning Cowes beach and within walking distance to the shops, medical facilities and schools.
These beautiful homes are brand new and offer three bedrooms, open plan living, entertainment decks and carport.
The décor is modern and the homes come with reverse cycle air-conditioning, floor coverings and with window coverings plus landscaped gardens.
In fact, there is nothing to do but just move in and start enjoying your new life in Phillip Island. These homes would also be excellent rental properties so would be a great investment.
Be quick as these will not last long, as they are offered at a very attractive price of $399,000 each.

Description:
When Location Counts
Perfectly situated in a quiet block of three, this rear unit is conveniently positioned approx 200 metres to Cowes North facing pristine beaches and a short stroll to Cowes shops, cafes, restaurants.
This spacious 2 Bedroom Unit comprising of open plan kitchen/meals area, separate lounge with built in bar, family bathroom with separate toilet and large laundry.
This property has many attractive characteristics which include exposed ceiling beams with timber lined and brick feature walls. Additional features include low maintenance front garden, private large courtyard, split system heating/cooling and a lock up single garage .
SENSATIONAL VALUE inspect by appointment today!
This property for sale in Cowes, is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Description:
Updated for today's needs!
This neat, sweet and complete single level weatherboard residence requires nothing more from it's new owners other than to move in and enjoy the island lifestyle being for permanent or holiday purposes.
Comprising spacious open plan living, kitchen and dining, three bedrooms, one bathroom and two toilets.
Additional features includes x4 split system heating and cooling units, gas fired wood heater, polished timber floors, hot and cold outside shower and stainless steel appliances to the kitchen.
The indoor entertainment area at the rear is complete with a combustion heater and split system and leads to the outside deck which is sure to impress all buyers and especially those who love to entertain their guests.
There is also a huge 9m x 6m garage/workshop which is ideal for boat/caravan accommodation in addition to ample parking spaces that includes the concrete driveway.
Set within a 604 sqm approx allotment with low maintenance surrounds and approximately 800 to the Cowes Beach.
This property for sale in Cowes, is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Description:
Centrally Located & Affordable Coastal Escape!
Phone Enquiry ID: 27955
Fancy an affordable holiday or permanent after-retirement home, that will perfectly facilitate your lifestyle overhaul? One that is just off the main drag of the tourist hotspot, Phillip Island?
Welcome to Cowes! The bustling town on the island that’s long been known for its unsurpassed beauty, penguin displays, chocolate factory, acclaimed culinary delights, beaches, fishing, shark & whale sightings, and host to decades of surfing adventure tales!
This level, 595sqm block offers a neat, comfortable and updated three bedroom, one bathroom home, perfectly positioned just 500m from the main street of Cowes and the water’s edge, just a 15 minute walk (1km) from your front door!
Renovated bathroom, laundry and neat kitchen, open plan dining and lounge with split system heating and cooling, two of the bedrooms come with large built-in-robes, and there is a huge backyard for the kids to roam and explore.
An affordable coastal-escape, a great opportunity to renovate in your own time while enjoying your surrounds, subdivide and build on the back (STCA), redevelop the whole site into your dream home like a lot of the neighbouring homes are doing - or buy now and ‘land-bank’ while this centrally located coastal home continues to grow!
Live everyday amongst some of the most picturesque, coastal scenery Gippsland has to offer. And, you can enjoy plenty more of it off the island on country-meets-coast trips out to San Remo, Kilcunda, Wonthaggi, Cape Paterson, Inverloch, all the way to WIlson’s Prom and beyond.
Whether you are into boating, water sports, kayaking, swimming, surfing, historic towns, fishing, walking, cycling, reading, shopping, dining out, art, photography, or wine tasting, there is something for everyone to enjoy - either right here at home or within an easy walk or a short drive away!
Insights: 17 Goondiwindi Drive, Cowes VIC 3922 was last sold in 2017 and 63 other 3 bedroom house in Cowes have recently been sold.

Description:
UNDER CONTRACT
Luxury townhouse located 195 meters form the waters' edge and a short distance from local shops, stores and restaurants. This prime position offers the best of Cowes all in less than a 5 minute walk. Located inside a private gated facility, this unit adjoins the pool and park within the secure and family friendly resort.
The double story property offers a total of 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms and large wide living area, balcony and private courtyard. Sit poolside or walk to the beach and bring back locally made fish and chips while you are down enjoying your new FULLY FURNISHED holiday house on Phillip Island!
Full features include
-remote control gate access to resort
-remote control garage
-BBQ pavilion
-heated pool
-reverse cycle split system
-stone bench tops
-window locks
-shared en-suite
-5,000 litre rain water tank
-lots of extra storage
-down-lights
-private fenced courtyard
-195 meters to beach
-close to shops & restaurants
-holiday rental potential
-being sold FULLY FURNISHED

Description:
Dual Accommodation Property - Money Maker Or Just One BIG Family Home
Phone Enquiry ID: 39053
Looking for a BIG family home that can perfectly facilitate the “permanent holiday” kind of lifestyle, or can accommodate elderly relatives independently, whilst still remaining under the same roof?
Perhaps the ultimate retirement in an unbeatable location, where you can enjoy a relaxed, beachy lifestyle while earning an income?
Brilliantly located just 5 mins walk to the heart of Cowes, Phillip Island, long known for its unsurpassed beauty, penguin displays, culinary delights, beaches, fishing, shark & whale sightings, and host to decades of surfing adventure tales!
Sizable, beautifully presented and updated, this huge, dual residence offers a lot of home and countless options for extended families, investors and lifestyle seekers, to acquire a property that can bend and flex to accommodate families of any configuration, throughout all stages of life.
Cleverly designed, offering two very functional dwellings - a three bedroom home and a two bedroom unit - each able to be completely separated or opened up and seamlessly combined - each comprising large kitchens, bathrooms, laundry facilities, heating/cooling, spacious indoor/outdoor living and private entries - PLUS, an 18 panel, 5kW (approx) solar system cutting your consumption dramatically!
The entire home comprises 3 spacious living zones, 2 outdoor entertaining areas, 2 kitchens, 5 bedrooms and 3 bathrooms (master with ensuite) - or, 4 bedrooms with robes, plus 5th bed/rumpus with a bathroom and laundry facilities; a double carport plus additional 2-car parking behind gates.
The unit includes bathroom with bath, separate laundry, large living, dining, kitchen and private outdoor entertaining.
The unit is currently an accommodation business with future bookings, a healthy nightly rate and great reviews! If short-stay hosting had crossed your mind, it’s all set-up and ready to take over.
Live in either side and rent out the other, or enjoy the entire home. Either way, the option is there!
Live everyday amongst some of the most picturesque, coastal scenery the Bass Coast has to offer. Whether you’re into boating, water sports, kayaking, swimming, surfing, history, coastal and country scenery, fishing, walking, cycling, reading, shopping, dining out or wine tasting, there is something for everyone to enjoy!
All offers will be considered.
Ring for an inspection at a time that suits you.
Insights: 30 Lansell Road, Cowes VIC 3922 was last sold in 2017 and 14 other 5 bedroom house in Cowes have recently been sold.

Description:
Business Opportunity Awaits
This amazing opportunity awaits in the convenient industrial estate in Cowes. This contemporary style factory including an upstairs office of approx 305 sq metres total in floor space, comprising both a toilet and kitchen room, this site is perfect to start your dream business. The ground floor factory space is made from concrete tilt slab and the office suite upstairs is surrounded by glass for natural light made for a perfect working environment. Undercover parking is available under the office and there are no body corporation fees applicable. At approximately 8 years old call now for further details! Land size approx 387 sq metres
This property for sale in Cowes, is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Description:
UNDER CONTRACT
Enjoy your own very private balcony with a full northerly aspect.
As you enter this recently renovated unit you are greeted with water views from every aspect.
The open living plan offers a large lounge room with direct access to the balcony, walk through kitchen with stone benches; large master bedroom with a full northerly aspect, the second bedroom has plenty of room for a queen bed. The bathroom has also been recently renovated. This is all about location – location with the beach just a few doors away and within walking distance to all that Cowes Central as to offer.
